meaningMnemonic: You <radical>request</radical> that <radical>winter</radical> <kanji>rescue</kanji> you from the warmth of the other seasons.
readingMnemonic: You get a note in the mail from winter! This is it, you're going to be rescued! You open the note and it says, "I have <kanji>rescue</kanji>d you with this <reading>cu</reading>cumber (きゅう)." A cucumber falls out of the note.
